text:
reporting year data for comparison purposes in the third ‘comparative’ column.
In column N (fourth column), the undertaking presents the current reporting year figures, and in
the fifth column it shall present the percentage reduction / increase of the value in the current
year over the previous year.
The milestones and target years columns are for reporting target information for the years 2025,
2030 and 2050 (if available). It is suggested to include all target values between 2035 and 2050
